meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lisa Kristina Lily Gebrenegus Matt Preston Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7644.

td.p: Lisa Kristina, a freelance musician from Chicago Heights, Illinois
Lily Gebrenegus, an accounting manager from Seattle, Washington
Matt Preston, an assets protection leader from Harvest, Alabama (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,998)

tr.td: BABY, YOU'RE A RICH MAN
HISTORICAL FICTION
NEW ENGLAND
SOME CHOICE WORDS
(Alex: We want you to name the league the franchise currently plays in...)
IN THEIR LEAGUE
"C" IN COOKING

tr.td: Matt
Lily
Lisa

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Matt
Lily
Lisa
JOHNNY GILBERT, TOUGH GUY
(Alex: You have to identify the movie Johnny is quoting.)
CEREMONIES
THE HUMAN BODY
MOZART
IN THE JUNGLE
